articles.description: Cloves are often used in cooking and baking, but they can also be taken as a dietary supplement. Learn more about clove supplements and their potential benefits.
articles.content:
Cloves are the buds of the Syzygium aromaticum tree, which is native to the Maluku islands located in the eastern part of Indonesia.
They have a sweet, slightly bitter taste and are highly fragrant.… [+9864 chars]
